title: ESE URI KURWANA NO KUBONA ICYEREKEZO?
content:
**ESE URI KURWANA NO KUBONA ICYEREKEZO?  DORE ZIMWE MU NAMA WAKURIKIZA** 

 - Gerageza gukora ibikorwa bishya igihe ugize ayo mahirwe. Ushobora kuvumbura impano karemano utari uzi ko ufite!
 - Ishyiremo imbaraga utekereza ibyubaka aho gutekereza ibisenya. Urugero, ivugishe uti, ‘Ndi umunyamwete, ‘Ndi mwiza’ cyangwa ‘Nabikora.’
 - Shaka inshuti n’abajyanama bagufashe kwagura impano zawe. Inshunti zishobora kukubakira icyizere zigushishikariza gukomeza kugerageza n’iyo wumva byarangiye. Banamenya n’igihe wakoze neza bakishimana nawe. Iyegereze inshuti zivuga ibyubaka kandi zatuma ugira umwete. 
 - Umuntu wese ugeze mu gihe cy’ubwangavu yumva afite amarangamutima menshi. Iyo wumva uganjijwe n’amarangamutima yawe, icyo byagufasha ni uguhumeka umwuka ukagera mu nda, gukora ikintu gituma umubiri wawe ukora nko kubyina no kugenda (iyo ntacyo bitwaye), cyangwa gushaka umuntu wizeye ukamuvugisha. 

**Kuba mu bukene n’amahirwe make, abakobwa benshi birabagora kubona icyerekezo. Mabreidy ni umukobwa umwe wari umerewe gutya. Dore inkuru ye:**
